snippet: The proposal would make it legal for those 21 and older to use and possess up to an ounce of marijuana, though not in public.
abstract: Alaska Lt Gov Mead Treadwell certifies ballot initiative application that would make it legal for adults to possess up to one ounce of marijuana, making state next battleground in effort to legalize the drug.
lead_paragraph: The proposal would make it legal for those 21 and older to use and possess up to an ounce of marijuana, though not in public.

headline.main: Alaska: Push to Legalize Marijuana Begins
